title: Scott Ippolito on Close Encounters of the Third Kind
itunes:title: Scott Ippolito on Close Encounters of the Third Kind
description:
We are not alone. Chuck sits down with his good buddy and cinematographer, Scott Ippolito, to take a close look at Close Encounters of the Third Kind.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
